description: An Ansible module to deploy blue print package on a set of servers in CenturyLink Cloud.

server_ids.description: A list of server Ids to deploy the blue print package.

package_id.description: The package id of the blue print.

wait.description: Whether to wait for the tasks to finish before returning.

state.description: Whether to install or un-install the package. Currently it supports only "present" for install action.

package_params.description: The dictionary of arguments required to deploy the blue print.
